long_description: Looking to give your first triathlon a shot without breaking the bank? Check out the men's Diamondback Interval, a fast bike with a 20-speed Shimano drivetrain and built-in aero bars. A feature that you'll definitely want for triathlons, the aero bars allow you to streamline your body position for maximum speed. Aero bars are easily detached by removing a bolt. Butted 7005 alloy frame with formed top tube and integrated head tube offer high durability. Shimano Tiagra shifters, derailleurs and cassette plus an FSA VERO crankset give you a drivetrain that is up to any task. Equation 700c aero deep dish rims laced to alloy hubs add a sleek, lightweight and aerodynamic wheelset to the mix. Tektro Rx3 Mini V brakes are controlled by Tektro ML730 2-finger brake levers with reach adjust for maximum stopping power. Specs on the Diamondback Interval are subject to change. Closeout.
short_description: Looking to give your first triathlon a shot without breaking the bank? Check out the men's Diamondback Interval, a fast bike with a 20-speed Shimano drivetrain and built-in aero bars.
